item.title: Report Writing
item.dc:creator: ayushi
item.description: Learn how to write a report for your school magazine or for a newspaper by seeing the format.
item.content:encoded:
Essentially, a report is a short, sharp, concise document that is written for a particular purpose and audience. It generally sets outs and analyses a situation or problem, often making recommendations for future action. It is a factual paper and needs to be clear and well-structured.

Magazine report

                                    Heading of report
                              By line- Name of the writer

The opening paragraph (introduction) 
The account of the event in detail- The proper sequence of events that occurred.
Conclusion– This will include a description of how the event ended. It may include quote excerpts from the Chief Guest’s speech or how did the event wind up.

newspaper report
